resources.string:
This game is very similar to the memory game. Only there are thirds of identical cards instead of pairs. Each player need to chose 2 cards from the board. if a pair was found, the player can go "hunt" for the third card with 2 more tries. if the third card was found, the player will get a bonus of 15 points. otherwise, the rival will be gain double turn. Alternatively, a player can "sleep" the last turn and not give the other player an extra turn.
if the third card was found on the first guess, the finder will get the whole set including 15 points bonous. if it was found second, the player may chose to take throw it away and get another turn, or get only the points for the individual card. the winner is the person with most points at the end of the game.
